title: Vitamix Pro 750 Heritage Blender
description: If you're feeling really generous, give them a Vitamix. This is the Lamborghini of blenders.

title: Set of 8 J.A. Henckels Steak Knives
description: Presented in a wooden box, these steak knives make an elegant gift.

title: Wusthof Gourmet 10-Piece Knife Block Set
description: With the essential knives for any kitchen, this 10-piece set provides a solid foundation for any cook.

title: Breville Juicer
description: There's nothing quite like waking up in the morning to fresh juice.

title: Barbecue Rub Gift Set, Pack of 3
description: This pack of three mouthwatering rubs is the perfect complement to any grilled or barbecued protein and makes a delicious gift for your favorite cook.

title: A'Rom French Macaron Mix
description: This delicious mix makes baking macarons easy for even novice bakers. Just add hot water and follow the instructions for perfect macarons.

title: White Marble Pastry Board
description: This elegant marble board is perfect for making delicate pastries.

title: Handheld Vegetable Spiralizer
description: This fun gift turns vegetables into spaghetti noodles.

title: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: An absolute kitchen essential. For bakers and chefs, amateur or pro. Not only is a KitchenAid one of the most useful appliances you can buy, it looks gorgeous on the counter. It also has a range of attachments from pasta makers to ice cream makers.

title: Pasta Machine
description: No dried pasta compares to the taste and experience of fresh homemade.

title: Madison Collection Cocktail Shaker
description: Inspired by the classic elegance of the bars found in European hotels, the Madison Collection cocktail shaker is perfect for mixing up a batch of your favorite libations.

title: Whiskey Ice Wedge Maker
description: Try a new slant on your whiskey sipping. This innovative gadget cools bourbon, tequila, scotch and other spirits without watering them down, thanks to a wedge of ice that chills each sip as itâ€™s tipped back.

title: Madison Collection 5-Piece Bar Set
description: This handsome set features a classic brushed-steel finish and includes a stand, a long-handled bar spoon, a jigger, a bar knife, a strainer and a bottle opener.

title: Olivewood Slice Cheese Board
description: Cut from a single piece of natural olivewood, this cheese board is a stylishly rustic way to serve cheese, charcuterie and more.

title: Olivewood Slice Serving Board
description: Cut from a single piece of natural olivewood, this serving board is a stylishly rustic way to serve charcuterie, small bites and more.
